artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Tsutaya Kichizō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 252, ōban #24.54
description: landscape view with figures climbing at right to path in front of buildings at left with a high view over a body of water with sailboats; mountain peak at center background; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Famous Sights of the Fifty-Three Stations (Gojūsan tsugi meisho zue 五十三次名所圖會), also known as the Vertical Tōkaidō (Tate Tōkaidō)
title: 54, Ōtsu
